message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $14000. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire an item that holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great asset to you as well. Please let me know if this proposal suits your needs.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $12000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to that amount?
